A '''Water Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Water-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn |- | Squirtle || | Totodile || Mudkip |- | Lapras || | Wooper || Feebas |- | Staryu || | Marill || Clamperl |- | Psyduck || | Qwilfish || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Cerulean City || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}
